channel.title: Comments on: Happy Birthday To Me, I’m 39
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3290/comment-page-1#comment-2013678">Albert (Alik)</a>.
Thanks a lot, man :) I can't wait to tell people about what we do as soon as we're out of stealth mode. My current diet is now mostly vegan, and I'm not even vegetarian (I do eat some meat occasionally). I'll write about it soon, hopefully.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Albert (Alik).

Thanks a lot, man :)
I can’t wait to tell people about what we do as soon as we’re out of stealth mode.
My current diet is now mostly vegan, and I’m not even vegetarian (I do eat some meat occasionally). I’ll write about it soon, hopefully.

item.title: By: Albert (Alik)
item.dc:creator: Albert (Alik)
item.description: Wish you a happy BDay and indeed it seems my wishes are coming true :) Regarding the site, `Contact Us` is the new `under construction`? ;) Curious as to your new Diet. Hope it contains zero animal suffering... All the best.
item.content:encoded:
Wish you a happy BDay and indeed it seems my wishes are coming true :)
Regarding the site, `Contact Us` is the new `under construction`? ;)
Curious as to your new Diet. Hope it contains zero animal suffering…
All the best.
